document_data.mainbody:
he Shadowy Eye was a mercenary organization within the Sevenfold Mazework of the Great Dismal Delve.
The Shadowy Eye was made-up of 900 dark creeper mercenaries.
This mercenary organization served as advanced scouts for the dao. Delivering false information was severely punished by the dao, so the dark creepers generally provided detailed reports.
The Sevenfold Mazework within the Great Dismal Delve served as base of all dao military organizations.
